title: 1960s美国高中课堂的纪律运动模拟

action: Stand for morning pledge with proper posture and hand over heart
speech: I pledge allegiance to the flag of the United States of America...
thoughts: It's important to start the day correctly with the pledge. Following the rules keeps me out of trouble and maintains good standing with Mr. Johnson and my classmates.
